name: The Courier (Schirwindt)
description:
The Courier is a first person runner which will allow you to explore the Jib-Eseo Meolli district of New Estuary city somewhere at some point in our future-past.
An anachronistic world filled with the ways of the old clashing with those of the new.
A mix of cultures and styles make the city feel alien to some but home truly is where you make it.

You play as the nameless courier working for Excelsior- the primary courier service in the area. A modest operation with a caring- albeit doltish- owner at the head who only communicates via phone to provide the courier with his jobs.
Times are not easy and payouts are moderate to say the least but if you work hard, you can keep the lights on in your apartment- heck, you may even be able to finally get new wallpaper or an actual bed.
If you desire to be better at your job, visit the gym to improve your stamina and keep yourself refreshed while working lest you have to plod to every delivery location.


MinimumRecommendedOperating SystemWindows 7 64-bit
Windows 10 64-bitProcessorQuad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.Intel 9700k or AMD 3700X processor.Memory8GB RAM
16GB RAM
Video CardNVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.NVIDIA GTX 1650 or AMD Radeon RX 570 series card or higher.

Voice

  • Joseph Griffiths - The Courier
  • All other voices preformed by Schirwindt

Art

  • Lunamiste
  • Luiza Ocker

Music

  • All music is original with the exception of Crazy Prices by Phil McClean (Used with permission from the artist)

The streets and alleys are silent, many people live in this city- yet all of them are alone- If you are interested in learning more about the world of The Courier, have a look at Chesnakisnak on Steam. A story-based game where your decisions will affect the story.

Also, if you would like to hear the soundtrack to the courier, it is available here.

P.S. The initial loading screen may look like it has frozen but depending on your hardware, it may take a while to actually load into the level, please be patient.
